title: Dr.
description:

He is part of the founders of this Department. He maintains a private practice as the 2nd generation orthodontist after his father who was a pioneer orthodontic professor in the MENA region. 
Dr. Khaled shifted to a Damon limited office by 2007 after believing in the system, in addition Dr Khaled was one of the founders members of  Damon KOL in MENA area.

title: Doctor
description:
Il dr. Alberti si laurea in odontoiatria e protesi dentaria presso l’Alma Mater Studiorum di Bologna nel 1999 con tesi in ortodonzia sociale svolta in Brasile.

Dal 2000 al 2001 ha frequentato il Gelb Center della TUFTS University di Boston in qualità di resident integrato con compiti clinici e di ricerca (uno dei più importanti centri al mondo dedicati esclusivamente alla diagnosi ed al trattamento dei disordini temporo-mandibolari). Di ritorno dall’esperienza americana inizia la libera professione instaurando numerosi rapporti di consulenza.

Nel 2003 apre il proprio studio dedicato esclusivamente all’ortodonzia.

Dal 2005 al 2008 ha collaborato con contratto libero professionale presso il reparto di Ortognatodonzia e Gnatologia del dipartimento di Odontostomatologia dell’Università di Bologna con compiti clinici e di integrazione all’insegnamento.

Dal 2010 è socio della World Federation of Orthodontist (WFO) e dell’Associazione Americana di Ortodonzia (AAO) e dal 2011 socio ordinario della SIDO (Società Italiana di Ortodonzia).

Nel 2011 ha conseguito la specializzazione in ortognatodonzia presso l’Università G. D´Annunzio di Chieti.

Dal 2013 è professore a contratto presso la Scuola di Specializzazione in Ortognatodonzia dell’Università G. D’Annunzio di Chieti.

Il dr. Alberti è stato relatori a numerosi corsi e congressi in Italia e all’estero e nel 2013 ha fondato il forum di ortodonzia clinica www.lacompagniaortodontica.it.

title: Doctor

title: Doctor
description:
Odontólogo especialista en Ortodoncia y Ortopedia Funcional de los Maxilares. Miembro de la World Federation of Orthodontist y de la Asociación Iberoamericana de Ortodoncistas. Presidente de la AIOI (Academia Internacional de Odontología Integral) Bahía Blanca.

Dentro de sus actividades académicas se desempeña como Profesor invitado en la Carrera de Especialista de Ortodoncia de la Universidad Católica Argentina (SAO), Profesor invitado del Posgrado de Ortodoncia de la Facultad de Odontología de Córdoba. Exprofesor adjunto en la materia de Arco Recto en la Universidad de Morón.

Ha impartido cursos y conferencias en la Sociedad Argentina de Ortodoncia y en instituciones de toda Argentina, Autralia, Colombia, Bolivia, Perú, Ecuador y Uruguay.
Primer Conferencista Argentino en participar como ponente en el Forum de EE.UU.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Bandeen graduated with honors from the University of Michigan School of Dentistry where he was inducted into the Omicron Kappa Upsilon dental honors society. He received his MS and orthodontic specialty training from the University of Tennessee where his thesis was honored with the James Powell Research Award. Dr. Bandeen has served on the faculty of the orthodontics department at the University of Tennessee as a clinical instructor and as director of the graduate course in cephalometrics and radiology. He shares a private practice with his wife and dentist, Dr. Emily Bandeen, and lectures nationally on clinical efficiency and tracking practice metrics.

title: Doctor
description: A diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics, Dr. Bicknell earned his DDS and completed a residency in orthodontics from the University of Illinois at Chicago where he also received a MS in oral biology. Now in private practice, he is a former clinical instructor at the university and continues his involvement there by lecturing to dental students and orthodontic residents throughout the year. He is active in his local community where he supports many organizations.

title: Doctor
description:
David Birnie graduated from Edinburgh Dental School in 1970 and spent three years as a lecturer in periodontology before starting his orthodontic training in 1975. Later that year he was appointed registrar in orthodontics at Kingston Hospital, Surrey and at the Royal Dental Hospital, London. In 1977, he moved to the Eastman Dental Hospital as a senior registrar in orthodontics. Since 1982, he has been a consultant orthodontist at Queen Alexandra Hospital, Portsmouth, is a visiting consultant and senior clinical lecturer in orthodontics at the University of Bristol Dental School and is in private orthodontic practice.

Clinical interests include:

-clinical applications of computers and health informatics 
 -pre-adjusted edgewise appliances 
 -self-ligating brackets 
 -clinical application of biomaterials research 
 -the non-surgical management of severe malocclusion 
 -orthognathic surgery 

David has lectured extensively throughout the United Kingdom including invited presentations at the British Orthodontic Conference, the Consultant Orthodontists Group Symposium, the British Dental Association's Annual and Scientific Meeting in addition to presenting lectures and papers in Cyprus, China, Belgium, France, Hong Kong, the Republic of Ireland, South Africa and in the USA. Since 2004, David has given courses on passive self-ligation, and fully customised orthodontic appliances, in Australia (Brisbane and Perth), Croatia, Denmark, Malaysia, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Poland, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Spain, Sweden, Thailand, the United Arab Emirates and the United Kingdom.  David has also given workshops at the International Damon Symposia held in Monaco (2005, 2006), Barcelona (2007), Rome (2008) and London (2009, 2010). In 2011, he will speak at the 10th Annual Damon Forum in Orlando, Florida. 

With Nigel Harradine, David has co-presented Excellence in Orthodontics in the United Kingdom since the first course in 1987 in York and at Excellence in Orthodontics overseas courses in Australia, Germany, Italy, Malaysia, Norway, Republic of Ireland, Switzerland and The Netherlands.

title: Doctor
description:
Graduated from Edinburgh Dental School in 1970 and spent three years as a lecturer in periodontology before starting his orthodontic training in 1975. Later that year he was appointed registrar in orthodontics at Kingston Hospital, Surrey and at the Royal Dental Hospital, London. In 1977, he moved to the Eastman Dental Hospital as a senior registrar in orthodontics. Since 1982, he has been a consultant orthodontist at Queen Alexandra Hospital, Portsmouth, is a visiting consultant and senior clinical lecturer in orthodontics at the University of Bristol Dental School and is in private orthodontic practice.
David has lectured extensively throughout the United Kingdom including invited presentations at the British Orthodontic Conference, the Consultant Orthodontists Group Symposium, the British Dental Association's Annual and Scientific Meeting in addition to presenting lectures and papers in Cyprus, China, Belgium, France, Hong Kong, the Republic of Ireland, South Africa and in the USA. Since 2004, David has given courses on passive self-ligation, and fully customized orthodontic appliances all over the World.
David is on the Council of the Faculty of Dental Surgery and is Chair of the Faculty of Health Informatics at the Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh where he is also a member of the Specialist Advisory Board in Orthodontics, Dental Examinations Committee and was an ex officio member of College Council. David passed the Diploma in Medical Informatics of the Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh in 2001, a part-time two year course on health informatics delivered over the internet. David represented the College on General Dental Council from 1998-2003 during which time he was a member of the Central Examining Board for Dental Hygienists, the Dental Auxiliaries Committee, the Health Committee, the Professional Conduct Committee, the PCD Curricula Overview Group, the Orthodontic Therapists Curriculum Working Group, the Registration Subcommittee of the Education Committee and the Registration Review Group. David is a past chairman of the Specialist Advisory Committee in Orthodontics and Paediatric Dentistry. At Queen Alexandra Hospital, David was Clinical Director for Surgery, Trauma and Oncology from 1994 to 1999 and is currently Associate Medical Director for Queen Alexandra Hospital's.

title: Doctor
description:
Dr. Frank Bogdan graduated from Mt. St. Mary’s College in 1970 where he received a B.S.
degree in Biology. He pursued his dental education at the University of Medicine and
Dentistry of New Jersey, receiving his DMD in 1973 and certificate in orthodontics in 1976.
During his last year of specialty training, he served as a teaching associate, giving lectures
in orthodontics to undergraduate dental students. Currently he is president of the UMDNJ
Orthodontic Alumni Society, a post at which he has been serving since 1997. Dr. Bogdan
has guest lectured at the University since 2001 and joined the part-time faculty in 2003. He
has maintained an active specialty practice in Bayonne, New Jersey since 1976.
Orthodontics and teaching have always been his passion. He has lectured for orthodontic
societies, study groups, and universities in the United States, Mexico, and Europe. The
one- and two-day presentations on the Damon System and advancements in jaw
orthopedics have been well received. In addition, he heads up the regional Damon study
group of orthodontists utilizing this state-of-the-art treatment system.

description: A recertified diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics, Dr. Bovenizer earned his DDS and certificate in orthodontics from West Virginia University School of Dentistry. Dr. Bo’s office is a popular site for professionals in the field to study the Damon system and his dynamic culture.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Burns earned her degree in Dental Medicine with honors from the University of Pittsburgh and her Certificate in Orthodontics and Masters of Education and Science from the Ohio State University. She received her certificate from the Roth Institute of TMJ centered orthodontic treatment and serves on the faculty of the OBI Foundation for Bioesthetic Dentistry. In orthodontic practice for over 27 years, Dr. Burns lectures internationally on the topics of Biologic Orthodontics and the role of the orthodontist in the treatment of patients with sleep disordered breathing. She also serves as a research mentor for orthodontic residents at West Virginia University, the University of Nebraska at Lincoln and the University of Pennsylvania.

title: Coach
description:
Coach diplômée de l’Université Paris VIII, elle a créé ProjetSens afin d’apporter
des solutions adaptées et locales aux attentes des professionnels.
Ses fonctions de responsable ressources humaines et de consultante dans un
cabinet de chasseur de tête spécialisé dans le secteur de la santé, l’ont amenée
à accompagner de nombreux dirigeants, cadres et équipes dans leur réussite.
Sa démarche est résolument tournée vers le développement du potentiel.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Chris Chang received his PhD in bone physiology and Certificate in Orthodontics from Indiana University in 1996 and is a Diplomate of American Board of Orthodontics(ABO). He is the author of iAOI workbook, ABO Case Reports, Orthodontics, Jobsology and publisher of International Journal of Orthodontics and Implantology(iJOI). Dr. Chang frequently lectures worldwide on a wide range of topics, including impaction treatment, OrthoBoneScrews, implant-orthodontic combined treatment and Jobs’ effective presentations. As a private instructor since 2006, he has taught over 2,000 doctors from more than 21 countries. In addition to teaching and publishing, he also founded Newton’s A, Inc. and Beethoven Orthodontic and Implant Group, based in Hsinchu, Taiwan. His passion in digital learning has led him to produce a complete series of video courses on orthodontics and implantology and an App, Beethoven Dental Encyclopedia. He has been actively involved in the design of orthodontic bone screws and application on impaction treatment. His latest focus is implant and orthodontic combined treatment.

title: Mr.
description: Landy Chase is a top US-ranked consultant and award-winning author who works exclusively with orthodontists to increase case starts. In the last 36 months alone, he has worked with 100+ orthodontic practices to improve case acceptance. A featured speaker for the AAO, the Schulman Study Group and Dr. Terry Sellke's Bottomline training program, he has written four best-selling books for the profession, including Yes to Treatment and No to Lost Cases with sales of over 5,000 copies. Prior to specializing in orthodontics, Mr. Landy served clients in over 60 industries in countries around the world with 2,000+ client engagements and books on selling to his credit that have earned top business awards.

title: Dr.
description: Dr. Coreil is a board certified orthodontist who has worked with children with craniofacial problems for nearly 30 years. In private practice, he is also associate professor of clinical orthodontics at Louisiana State University School of Dentistry and is actively involved as an orthodontist on the Children's Hospital Cleft and Craniofacial Team. He received his DDS and his orthodontic specialty training from Louisiana State University School of Dentistry. He completed the Roth/Williams Advanced Clinical Programs and lectures nationally and internationally on clinical and practice management issues related to orthodontics.

title: Doctor
description: Dr Richard Cure, specialist in Orthodontics Honorary Associate Clinical Professor, Course and Clinical Director of Orthodontics, The University of Warwick. Fellow of the Higher Education Academy. Richard is the founder of LSO and he leads the team at this multi-surgery Orthodontic Practice in Leamington Spa. During more than 25 years in Orthodontics, Richard has gained vast experience in all modes of treatment and different appliance systems including over 5000 cases with the Damon System. His expertise has led to lecturing, examining and research appointments in the UK and abroad, including North America, Scandinavia, the Middle East and Far East and he has published papers in many scientific journals.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Dwight Damon is an industry-leading orthodontist widely known for his development of the Damon System. Dr. Damon is a pioneer in the field, lecturing worldwide to both doctors and staff on the most advanced orthodontic treatment philosophies. Holding a practice for more than 40 years, Dr. Damon has written several professional articles and his work has been featured in leading trade journals, including the Journal of Clinical Orthodontics and the American Journal of Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics. He is a member of leading industry associations, including: the American Association of Orthodontics, the Pacific Coast Society of Orthodontists, the American Dental Association and the Washington State Dental Association.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Bill Dischinger received his dental degree from Oregon Health & Science University School of Dentistry in 1997 and his certificate in orthodontics at Tufts University in Boston in 1999. His B.S. degree is from Oregon State University. In private practice with his father, Dr. Terry Dischinger, Bill has taught at their in-office comprehensive courses and used the Damon System for over 12 years. He is one of 12 certified Damon instructors who have taught and lectured extensively on passive self-ligation with the Damon System. He has also lectured nationally and internationally on a variety of subjects, including functional jaw orthopedics, indirect bonding, and practice management from a team approach. Dr. Dischinger has written articles published in Orthodontic Products, Orthotown and Ormco’s  Clinical Impressions and is actively involved in national study clubs that address the latest treatment techniques. He is a member of the American Association of Orthodontists, Pacific Coast Society of Orthodontists, the American Dental association and orthodontic professional associations that enable him to actively participate in continual education and remain current on advances in orthodontic treatment.

Obecnie jest adiunktem w Zakładzie Wad Rozwojowych Twarzy Katedry Ortopedii Szczękowej i Ortodoncji Uniwersytetu Medycznego we Wrocławiu. Przez wiele lat, jako specjalista ortodoncji, konsultowała w Klinice Chirurgii Szczękowo-Twarzowej UMED we Wrocławiu, w zespole zajmującym się leczeniem wad ortognatycznych pod kierownictwem dr n. med. Wojciecha Pawlaka. Prowadzi specjalistyczną praktykę ortodontyczną „OrthoLine”. 
Ukończyła wiele krajowych i międzynarodowych szkoleń, tj.: Masterclass in Orthognathic Surgery w Londynie, kurs eksperta w ortodoncji przedchirurgicznej i chirurgii ortognatycznej na Międzynarodowym Uniwersytecie Katalońskim w Barcelonie. 
Jest autorką licznych publikacji i wystąpień na konferencjach krajowych. Uczestniczka staży szkoleniowych (USA, Niemcy). 
Jest członkiem Polskiego Towarzystwa Ortodontycznego i Europejskiego Towarzystwa Ortodontycznego.

title: Doctor
description: Ph.D. in Medicine and Surgery, Stomatology Specialist, Master's degree in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopaedics (University of Seville), Professor in Oral Health at the University of Córdoba. Author of various scientific articles, papers and lecturer in conferences, as well as for numerous courses given both nationally and internationally. He has taught the Damon System in Spain, Europe as well as in USA and Latin America. He has shared the podium with Dr. Damon and other distinguished Damon followers in the different Forums held in Palm Springs, California, USA (2006) Monaco (2005, 2006), Barcelona (2007) and Rome (2008). Member of the SEDO (Spanish Society of Orthodontics), AESOR (Spanish Association of Orthodontists), AIO (Latin American Association of Orthodontists), WFO (World Federation of Orthodontists) and Member of the Spanish Division of the Pierre Fauchard Academy. He runs his private clinic in Córdoba, where he started using the Damon System in 2001 and, since the clinical period spent in Dr. Damon's office (Spokane, 2003), he is an exclusive user of that technique.Dr. García Espejo is currently considered one of the pioneers in the System, his experience and prestige being internationally recognized throughout the Damon community. His presence is requested in most forums and meetings organized for the professional dissemination of this technique, not only in Spain and Europe but even intercontinentally (USA, Latin America, Asia). He currently runs and gives, together with Dr. R. Perera, the first European Damon Master, for the introduction, training and in depth study of the technique.

title: Doctor
description:
Laurea in medicina e chirurgia – Università di Siena 1982, Specializzazione in odontostomatologia Università di Siena 1986. Specializzazione in Ortodonzia Università di Siena 2002 Libero professionista con attività limitata all’ortodonzia presso studio professionale in Via Guido Monaco 100 Arezzo Professore a contratto – Scuola di specializzazione in ortodonzia dell’Università di Siena dal 1994 al 2011 – Insegnante allo short term orthodontic course dell’ Università di Aarhus (Danimarca) dal 1992 ad oggi – Docente in corsi privati di biomeccanica ed arco segmentato in Italia, Germania, Polonia, Portogallo, Ungheria e Olanda dal 1991 ad oggi.- Docente e responsabile Master di Biomeccanica e Ortodonzia dell’Adulto, Università di Siena dal 2002 al 2014. Visiting Professor Buffalo Univ. (2012-14). Insegnante al corso di perfezionamento in biomeccanica e tecnica dell’arco segmentato presso l’ Università di Siena negli anni 1991-93 Organizzatore, responsabile e docente della International Orthodontic Biomechanics Summer School, che tiene dal 2013 corsi in Italia per studenti stranieri.
Interessi di ricerca e insegnamento: Biomeccanica ortodontica, Tecnica dell’arco segmentato, Informatica e ortodonzia Ha tenuto corsi e relazioni su invito del comitato organizzatore delle società ortodontiche nazionali italiana, americana, europea giapponese, australiana, polacca, finlandese, greca. Oltre ai corsi e lezioni presso le Università di Siena e di Aarhus (Danimarca) ha tenuto corsi di biomeccanica presso le università di Edmonton Canada, Baylor – Dallas Texas, NYU e Buffalo, NewYork, Philadelphia – Pennsylvania e Chicago – Illinois (USA), Berlino Humboldt, – Germania Goteborg – Svezia e in numerose Università Italiane. Ad oggi 26 pubblicazioni in riviste nazionali e internazionali Autore di “Biomechanics in Orthodontics – Multimedia Learning Software”, attualmente alla 4° edizione (1993-2015) – Coautore in due capitoli di “Adult Orthodontics” Editor B. Melsen – Coautore di “Orthodontics Pearls” Editor L. White, Coautore diel Capitolo “Statically Determined Appliances and Crative Mechanics” in “The Biomechanical Foundation of Clinical Orthodontics” Editors Burstone e Choy. Socio ordinario della SIDO (Società Italiana di Ortodonzia) di cui è stato segretario negli anni 98-99 e consigliere nel 2006-7. Socio EOS (European Orhodontic Society). Socio AAO American Association of Orthodontists, Socio della WFO (World Federation of Orthodontists) Vice presidente della SIBOS nel 2000-2003, (Società Italiana di Biomeccanica e Ortodonzia Segmentata) A partire dal 2009 ha organizzato convegni professionali a scopo benefico, che hanno portato fondi per oltre 40.000 Euro in Brasile, Haiti ed Etiopia, in collaborazione con Save the Children Italia.

title: Doctor
description:
Dr. Frost received his dental degree at the University of the Pacific School of Dentistry and practiced general dentistry for 5 years – two with his father and three in his own office. Following a one-year fellowship in temporomandibular joint dysfunction, he completed a two-year residency in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics at the University of Rochester.
Dr. Frost practices in Mesa, Arizona. He is currently a part-time associate clinical professor at the University of the Pacific orthodontic program and has lectured on the Damon system at several Damon Forums and other Ormco-sponsored events, including the national American Association of Orthodontists annual session and component meetings and his own Damon in-office seminars.
By his peers, Dr. Frost has been named one of Phoenix’s top orthodontists for the periods of 2004-2006 and 2008-2010.

Da gennaio 2009 al 2012 è Tutor della Scuola di Specializzazione in Ortognatodonzia di Chieti curando l’aspetto clinico e scientifico. 
E’ Socio della SIBOS (Società Italiana di Biomeccanica e Ortodonzia Segmentata)

E’ relatore in corsi e congressi nazionali e internazionali ed è autore di pubblicazioni su riviste internazionali.

title: Dr.
description: Dr. Abhisek Ghosh passed his B.D.S from Ragas Dental College, Chennai (Dr.M.G.R Medical University) as the best outgoing student (Orthodontics),and M.D.S in orthodontics from the prestigious Manipal College of Dental Sciences, Mangalore (Manipal University) as also the Best outgoing student. He is also the recipient of the Best Clinical Poster Award at the 47th Indian Orthodontic Society Conference and 8th APOC, New Delhi, 2012 and the 3rd best paper in Clinical Innovation at the 48th Indian Orthodontic Society Conference, Ahmedabad, 2013. He is also the winner of the George Jacob Award for excellence in clinical innovation presented by the Indian Orthodontic Society in 2014. He is peer reviewer and a member of the editorial board for the Journal of IOS. His clinical work has frequently found place in national and international journals. He was also the Co-Convener scientific committee of the 49th IOC held in Kolkata in the year, 2014 and also the present convener of Orthodontic study group of Newtown, Kolkata.

He has been a Professor at the Alfonso X El Sabio University Orthodontics Master's Degree  in Madrid for six year (2005-2011), as well as Professor at the Orthodontics Master's Degree of the European University of Madrid (2009-2012). For the past nein years (2002-2011) he has been the President of New Technologies Committe at the Official College of Odontologists and  Stomatologist of the 1st Region. He also has a great experience as a speaker at international and national conferences.

title: Doctor
description:
Dr. Firas Hamzeh started his postgraduate training program at the University of Nantes -France in 1994.

He obtained his first certificate of advanced studies in dental materials used in dentistry in December 1995 and his certificate of high studies in dento facial orthopedics in 1997 

At the same university, while he was studying this certificate he started his diploma in orthodontics in 1996 and he obtained his Masters in 1999.

Dr Hamzeh moved to Dubai in 2000 and he started his practice in the private sector , he started to use the self-ligating brackets with the Damon system in the year 2004 and he continued his advanced training with Damon system with best ormco’s educators then he became an exclusive user of Damon system in his practice Since the year 2008 ,

He’s one of KOL with Damon system and Insignia in the Middle East.

Dr. Firas Hamzeh had advanced knowledge in Orthodontic digital solutions   Dr. Hamzeh is recognized as an early adopter and advocate of innovative orthodontic systems including aligners and digital custom brackets INSIGNIA BRACES (he was also the first Insignia user in the UAE) his first case was in 2012 .in addition to being KOL (key opinion leader) for ORMCO and an international Ormco speaker.

In addition to this he loves to treat the TMD cases because he has been following a lot of training program in occlusion and TMJ including the ROTH Williams philosophy.

He completed his postgraduate training program in TMJ, occlusion and orthodontics – San Sebastian, Spain. 

Since 2013 he’s treating patients with temporomandibular joint disorders

Dr. Hamzeh has presented in so many international orthodontic conferences, his main focus in his lectures is the digital orthodontics and the Damon system.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Heise is a very experienced clinician and is now holding in office courses, teaching all the benefits of the Damon System. Within his course he also gives the Dr’s the chance to see a live bond up by using a video link from the dental chair to a seminar room. By working with typodonts, Dr. Heise teaches Dr’s the step by step process of the mechanics of the Damon System. Owns the Haranni akademie.

title: Doctor
description:
Nigel Harradine qualified from Guys Hospital, London in 1971 and was then a house surgeon at Guys before undertaking his undergraduate medical training, qualifying again from Guys in 1975. A medical house physician post followed at Guys and then a year as an intern in London, Ontario before he settled on orthodontics as his chosen speciality and returned to the United Kingdom. A year of full-time general dental practice was followed by the two-year orthodontic course at the Royal Dental Hospital, London and Kingston Hospital, Surrey. In 1981, Nigel went to the Eastman Dental Hospital, initially as a lecturer and then as a senior lecturer in orthodontics. Since 1984 he has been a consultant at Bristol Dental Hospital and School where he is in charge of the undergraduate program and fully involved in the postgraduate teaching.

Particular clinical interests have included:

-the use of computers for planning and recording the effects of treatment and for storing 
 -digital clinical records 
 -functional appliances 
 -the Straight-Wire Appliance pre-adjusted edgewise appliances 
 -self-ligating brackets 
 -the effects of orthognathic surgery

title: Doctor
description:
Titulaire d’un diplôme d’orthodontie de l’Université de Milan (Università degli Studi di Milano) en 2006, le Dr Luis Huanca Ghislanzoni a suivi, la même année, le Short-Term Orthodontic Program de l’Université Aarhus au Danemark. Il s’est spécialisé dans l’orthopédie dento-faciale à l’Université de Milan en 2009, où il a également obtenu son Doctorat en 2013. Il a ensuite déménagé en Suisse, où il exerce principalement sous le statut de professionnel libéral à Lausanne et Neuchâtel. Il collabore avec l'Université de Genève en tant que chercheur à temps partiel, au sein du département d’orthodontie du Professeur Kiliaridis. Il continue également de collaborer avec le cabinet familial situé à Albino (province de Bergame en Italie).
Il a de nombreuses publications dans des revues internationales à son actif. Il est souvent invité comme intervenant dans le cadre de congrès et de Masters d’orthodontie au sein des universités italiennes, ainsi qu’à l’étranger.
En 2015, il a fondé Orthogeek avec son ami le Dr Berardinelli. Il s’agit d’un groupe Facebook qui propose un calendrier en ligne des principaux événements académiques dans le domaine de l’orthodontie en Italie et dans le reste du monde.
Depuis 2017, il tient un blog (http://luishuanca.info/the3dorthodontist/) à travers lequel il partage son expérience de la pratique entièrement numérique depuis quelques années, dans le but d’encourager ses collègues et de les inciter à tirer profit au maximum des avantages que présentent les nouvelles technologies pour les orthodontistes et leurs patients.

title: Dr.
description:
Professor Emeritus , Distinguished Professor and Chief Mentor , Principal Consultant and Advisor , Max health Care , Chief architect and mentor JSM Smart health Analytics

Graduated with a University roll of Honor, Gold medal and academic achievements in 1976, Commissioned into the Army Dental Corps, and has served with distinction both in India and abroad. Selected for deputation to the Sultanate of Oman in 1983, was also appointed as Liaison officer with the Indian embassy for all bilateral matters pertaining to the armed forces. Awarded the Order of the Special Royal Emblem by Sultan of Oman for distinguished services in 1986. Received his Masters degree (MDS) from AFMC with highest possible grades, recipient of the General Master Memorial Silver Medal, served as a classified and senior specialist in various flagship establishments and published both military and professional papers.

Has since been on the forefront in Academics, Clinical Practice, Healthcare administration and is an International key opinion leader and consultant .Has lectured and taught extensively over South America, USA, UK, Europe, West Asia, SE Asia, China, Japan, Australia, New Zealand, Brazil,Latin America. He has trained in Germany in lingual orthodontics at the Karl Eberhardt University in 2000 and has taught lingual orthodontics globally. He received advanced instructional training in Lingual Orthodontics (Incognito) in 2010 in Bad Essen Germany and is an international key opinion leader. He has has been involved in consultancy, product development and clinical strategy for 15 years .has been a part of the Evidence Based health Initiative since 2000 and has been actively involved with EBD UK. Has been involved with national health care / education policy and planning, made presentations to the Planning Commission, National Knowledge Commission and the Ministry of Health and Family welfare, GOI, WHO.Member of the National Council on Clinical Establishments.
 A Professor Emeritus at one of the most prestigious institutions in the National capital region, he is also a distinguished professor and chief mentor at a leading institution in southern India .a principal Consultant and Advisor to one of the most prestigious health care groups in India.He is also involved in developing health care analytics for hospital services. He is accredited to practice in Dubai and has a consulting practice in India and abroad .Has chaired the Diplomate of the National Board of Examinations several times , examiner to several universities , has guided over 200 post graduate dissertations , been a consultant to industry , is on the editorial board of several prestigious international journals ; EBD UK , EAPD , responsible of setting up the first dedicated evidence based dentistry centre in SE Asia in 2000.

He has written and published extensively, is on the editorial board of several prestigious International journals and has a specific interest in Evidence based health care. He has a special interest in Adult Orthodontics, TADS, Aesthetic Orthodontics and early treatment. He received a Lifetime Achievement award at the FDI SFDS for contributions to Military Dentistry and Oral Health Sciences. He has the distinction of lecturing , teaching in 41 countries around the globe.

title: Doctor
description:
Dr. Kammerman graduated with honors from the Indiana School of
Dentistry where he was inducted into the Omicron Kappa Upsilon dental
honors society. He received his post doctoral Orthodontic training with
honors at the University of Maryland School of Dentistry and is a Diplomate
of the American Board of Orthodontics. In private practice since 1985 in
Garden City, Long Island, Dr. Kammerman has been an exclusive Damon
practitioner for ten years. He is a native New Yorker and currently resides in
Brookville, Long Island with his wife Marsha.

title: Doctor
description:
Dr. Kozlowski has been setting the highest standards of excellence in orthodontics for over a decade.  He graduated magna cum laude from SyracuseUniversity in 1992, earning a Bachelor of Science Degree in Economics. He obtained his Doctor of Dental Surgery degree in 1996 from the State University of New York at Buffalo School of Dentistry where he also completed a residency in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics, graduating in 1998. 

Dr. Kozlowski is a member of many leading orthodontic and dental organizations, including the American Dental Association, American Association of Orthodontists, and the Connecticut State Dental Society. He has been published in several orthodontic journals, including Seminar in Orthodontics, the Journal of Clinical Orthodontics, and Clinical Impressions. 

As a certified Damon System educator and a lead developer of Insignia custom braces, Dr. Kozlowski has become an internationally sought after speaker. He lectures extensively to orthodontists all over the world on various topics, including efficiency and excellence in orthodontics, early treatment, facial esthetics, and computerized custom braces. He has made presentations at meetings hosted by the American Association of Orthodontists, Northeast Society of Orthodontics, Massachusetts Society of Orthodontics, North American Damon Forum, as well as numerous other dental societies, universities, study clubs and alumni organizations.

Spécialiste certifié en orthopédie dento-faciale,

Technique and Education).
Le Dr Lemasson enseigne en Europe, au Maroc
et au Moyen-Orient.

description:
Dr. Lin is a clinical professor in the Department of Orthodontics at Taipei
Medical University, is a past president of the Taiwan Association of
Orthodontists, and maintains a private orthodontic practice. Dr. Lin has
published “Creative Orthodontics, Blending the Damon System and TADs to
Manage Difficult Malocclusions.”, 1st edition 2007, 2nd edition 2010. “Class
III Correction Orthodontics”, 1st edition 2013.
M.S and Certificate in Orthodontics, Marquette University (USA)
(Orthodontic Graduate Program) 2000~2002: President of the Taiwan
Association of Orthodontists 2004~present: Clinical Professor, Taipei
Medical University (Orthodontic Department) Director of Lin’s Orthodontic
Center Senior consultant of Taiwan Orthodontics Society Senior consultant
of Taiwan Association of Orthodontics.

title: Dr.
description:
Dr. Aravind graduated from College of Dental Sciences, Davangere and has more than 8 years of post-graduate teaching experience at KLE Society’s Institute of Dental Sciences, Bangalore.

He is also associated with Confident digital dental laboratory and Ormco India, and has undertaken research in the field of digital applications in Lingual Orthodontics. He has delivered several lectures with special emphasis on biomechanics in lingual orthodontics and effective usage of STB light lingual brackets.

He has been an invited speaker at national conferences and several CDE programs. He has several International and national publications to his credit.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Gualtiero Mandelli graduated in Medicine and Surgery from University of Study of Milan in 1985. After the graduation, he achieved three post-graduate specializations in: Orthodontics, Stomatology and Pediatrics in the same University. He was Visiting Professor in Orthodontics at University of Parma from 2003 to 2010 and from 2011 he is Visiting Professor at Specialization School in Orthodontics at University of Brescia. His private practice is in Lombardia. He is member of SIDO from 1995. Dr. Mandelli is also author of various scientific works and has given talks and presentations at numerous courses and congresses. In the last four years, he has dedicated his Orthodontic Biomechanics research, in particular, to the use of phase auxiliaries in order to increase the clinical efficiency of base set up in phase 1 and phase 2.

title: Doctor
description:
Doctor Dimitrios Mavreas is currently a Clinical Professor at Vrije University in
 Brussels, Belgium, and maintains a private practice in Athens, Greece. He is
 also affiliated to the Hellenic Craniofacial Center, Athens, Greece, treating
 craniofacial anomaly and cleft patients.
 He completed his orthodontic training at the Department of Orthodontics,
 Aarhus, Royal Dental College, Denmark, (Master of Science Degree), and
 also had postgraduate training in Occlusion and TMJ Management at the  Department of Occlusion, Georgetown University School of Dentistry, Washington DC, USA. In addition he holds a PhD degree from the University of Athens, School of Dentistry, Greece.
 He has worked as an Assistant Professor at the Department of Orthodontics in Aarhus, Denmark.
 He has published numerous articles in various orthodontic journals. He has  been lecturing extensively on the Damon system and various other topics.

title: Dr.
description: Mike Mayhew, DDS, MS, received his dental education at the University of North Carolina with specialty degrees in pediatric dentistry and orthodontics. He is board certified in both specialties and operates a dual-specialty practice in Boone and North Wilkesboro, North Carolina. Dr. Mayhew has lectured nationally and internationally on the Damon™ System, CAD-CAM digital orthodontics, indirect bonding, and office utilization of CBCT. He is on the Sports Medicine Team at Appalachian State University, is an adjunctive clinical professor at the UNC School of Dentistry, has held leadership positions in organized dentistry, and serves as the director of the North Carolina/South Carolina Damon Study Club. He was inducted into the American College of Dentists in 2010 and the International College of Dentists in 2013.

title: Doctor
description: B.Ch.D.University Stellenbosch. Orthodontic training at the university of Frankfurt, training in the practice of Praxis Dr. Toll in Bad Soden, Germany and with Prof. Axel Bumann in Kiel with an emphasis on jaw diseases and how to treat them. Works at the Gemeinschaftspraxis in Herrsching am Ammersee, Germany since 15 years.  Also works in Great Britain and Vilnius, Lithuania for the orthodontic treatment of patients with severe jaw diseases. Internationally recognize lecturer since 2006. Damon user since 2003.

title: Doctor
description:
Laureata in odontoiatria, Specializzata in Ortognatodonzia all’Università del’Insubria (2004) Ha frequentato il reparto di Ortognatodonzia dell’Università di Siena tra il 2009 e il 2012 dove ha completato il master in “Ortodonzia del paziente adulto”., discutendo la tesi finale dal titolo “Riposizionamenti Mandibolari nel Paziente Adulto”. Lavora come ortodontista nei suoi studi privati a Lugano (CH) e Luino (VA). Socio Ordinario della SIDO e della SIBOS. Ha collaborato come insegnante ai corsi di biomeccanica del Dr. Giorgio Fiorelli
 in Italia e all’estero (USA, Portogallo, Polonia, Svezia ) a partire dal 2011. E’ stata invitata come speaker al XIV congresso Panellenico. Ha partecipato come relatrice ai convegni
 Melsen & Friends (2010) e Burstone & Friends (2012). Autrice di due pubblicazioni in campo ortodontico. Ha contribuito al libro “Orthodontic Pearls” di Larry White, è stata Coautore nel Capitolo “Statically Determined Appliances and Crative Mechanics” in “The Biomechanical Foundation of Clinical Orthodontics”

title: Mr.
description: As Ormco’s Senior Manager of Digital Marketing, Alex Miroshnichenko is responsible for all aspects of Ormco’s worldwide electronic activities. He directs multiple websites, including e-commerce, doctor locators, blogs, mobile applications, pay-per-click, banner and Facebook advertising, email campaigns, search engine optimization (SEO), social media and advanced analytics. With 16+ years experience in the field, Mr. Miroshnichenko’s background includes work experience with E*TRADE, American Automobile Association (AAA) and Toshiba Medical. He has been featured in The Wall Street Journal, Business Week and Fortune as well as on CNN, Fox News, MSNBC and CNET on leveraging blog and social media platforms.

W roku 1996 zdał egzamin specjalizacyjny I stopnia z zakresu stomatologii ogólnej. W 2003 zdał egzamin specjalizacyjny z ortodoncji.

Publikuje prace w czasopismach polskich, bierze czynny udział w konferencjach i zjazdach krajowych oraz międzynarodowych.

title: Dr n. med.
description:
Dr n. med. Rafał Nowak - specjalista chirurgii szczękowo-twarzowej
Studia na Wydziale Lekarskim z Oddziałem Stomatologii Akademii Medycznej im. Piastów Śląskich we Wrocławiu ukończył w 2000 roku.
Od 2003 roku jest pracownikiem Katedry i Kliniki Chirurgii Szczękowo-Twarzowej UM we Wrocławiu oraz Uniwersyteckiego Szpitala Klinicznego we Wrocławiu.
Od 2014 roku konsultant z zakresu chirurgii szczękowo – twarzowej Uniwersyteckiego Szpitala Klinicznego w Zielonej Górze.
Współtwórca i współwłaściciel prywatnej praktyki Centrum Chirurgii i Estetyki Twarzy we Wrocławiu współpracującej w obszarze zabiegowym z najnowocześniejszym na Dolnym Śląsku centrum medycznym Medicus Clinic.
Jest współautorem 79 prac naukowych i doniesień zjazdowych z zakresu chirurgii szczękowo-twarzowej opublikowanych w czasopismach naukowych oraz przedstawionych na konferencjach międzynarodowych i krajowych.
Wykładowca i organizator kursów specjalistycznych z zakresu chirurgii szczękowo-twarzowej i chirurgii ortognatycznej oraz uczestnik licznych kursów doskonalących z zakresu chirurgii jamy ustnej, szczękowo-twarzowej, ortodoncji i implantologii.
Zainteresowania praktyczne obejmują szeroko pojętą chirurgię kostną w zakresie części twarzowej czaszki i jamy ustnej, zabiegi rekonstrukcyjne przedprotetyczne i przedimplantologiczne, chirurgię ortognatyczną, traumatologię czaszkowo-szczękowo-twarzową oraz zastosowanie technologii 3D w planowaniu zabiegów operacyjnych.
Uczestnik staży klinicznych w renomowanych ośrodkach chirurgii szczękowo-twarzowej m. in. w Brugii, Antwerpii, Munster, Dreźnie, Mediolanie. Członek i stypendysta European Association for Cranio-Maxillo-Facial Surgery, stypendysta Funduszu im. E. Niedźwirskiego oraz członek Polskiego Towarzystwa Chirurgii Jamy Ustnej i Chirurgii Szczękowo Twarzowej.
Prywatnie pasjonat deski w każdym wydaniu – na śniegu, wodzie i kółkach, MTB, gór i zdrowego stylu życia.

title: Dr.
description: Dr. Olsen received his dental degree from the University of Iowa.  Following one-year Advanced Education in General Dentistry focused on complex patient prosthetic care, he completed a four-year dual-specialty program at Indiana University in Prosthodontics and Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics along with his Masters’ degree in Dental Science.  He has authored/coauthored over 18 published journal articles and presented his research at National Dental conferences.  Following graduation from Indiana University, he opened his private practice in Montana.  He currently maintains private practices in Central Montana and Central Wyoming.  He has been an exclusive provider of the Damon System since 2007.

title: Doctor
description: •Member of many associations including the American Association of Orthodontists, the Canadian Association of Orthodontists, the Ontario Dental Association, and the Royal College of Dentists of Canada.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Darsh Patel obtained his degree in Dentistry from the University of Manchester, and postgraduate in Orthodontics at Birmingham Dental Hospital. He runs a multi-award winning, 100% private practice in London, United Kingdom solely utilising self ligating buccal appliances. With nearly a decade of utilising the Damon system and other self ligating appliances, Darsh is hugely enthused by the positive changes modern brace systems have brought to orthodontic treatment. He is a key opinion leader of a number of orthodontic appliances and lectures upon various orthodontic techniques locally, nationally and internationally.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Perera obtained his degree in Medicine and Surgery from the University of Barcelona in 1981 and then went on to complete his studies in Stomatology in 1983. In 1986, he completed postgraduate studies in Orthodoncy at the Centro Europeo de Ortodoncia in Madrid. From 1995 to 1997 he then completed a further series of studies with the Roth-Williams Centre. R. Perera has been a member of SEDO since 1991 and is also a member of AESOR, AIO and WFO. He is the author of various scientific articles and has given talks and presentations at numerous courses and congresses. Dr. Perera was a pioneer in the introduction of the Damon System in Spain. He first began using the Damon System in 2001 and since his visit to Dr. Damon’s surgery in Spokane, in 2003, he has exclusively used this system at his surgeries in Lleida and Tarragona.

title: Dottor
description:
Laureato In Odontoiatria e Protesi Dentaria nel 1994 presso l’ Università Di Siena. Frequenta il reparto di Anatomia presso il Kings College  di Londra diretto dal Prof. Berkovitz per le problematiche articolari nel 1994. Ottiene il Certificate of Orthodontics  presso Eastman Dental Center di Rochester (NY, USA) nel 1997. Collabora con il reparto di Gnatologia diretto dal Prof. Tallents presso Eastman Dental Center dal 1993. Specializzato presso la Scuola di Ortognatodonzia Università di Ferrara nel 2015.

Docente presso la Scuola di Specializzazione di Ortognatodonzia Università di Ferrara.

Socio SIDO, ASIO e AIDOR, International member AAO, socio American Lingual Orthodontics Association, socio Società Italiana Ortodonzia Linguale.

Relatore presso Fondazione Castagnola,  SIDO,  ANDI,  AIO.

Relatore presso il dipartimento di Ortodonzia Tufts University a Boston (MA, USA).

title: Dr.
description:
Dr. C S Ramachandra completed his MDS – Orthodontics in year 1988 from Govt. Dental College, Bengaluru. He is now in teaching profession for more than 25 years. As a clinician, he has treated large number of patients with varying types of malocclusion and dentofacial deformities.
Area of Interest: Orthodontic management of cleft lip and palate cases, surgical orthodontics and Self Ligating System.
Research and Training: He was the all India consultant for Vistadent-OC, a treatment simulation software used in orthodontic & orthognathic cases. He has conducted several training programs to create awareness among clinicians and postgraduate students about this software. Presently started conducting training programs to popularize SLB’s.
He is also a Diplomate of IBO which is a certification given by the IBO after being peer reviewed by the panel of judges about the quality of treatment rendered. He has developed interest in Damon Philosophy and started using the system in selected cases for last four years.

title: Frau
description:
– Katharina Renter zählte in den 90er Jahren zu den internationalen Topmodels. 10 Jahre lang lebte und arbeitete sie in den USA, u.a. in Miami, New York und Los Angeles.
– Seit 1995 wechselte sie hinter die Kamera, und arbeitet seitdem als freie internationale Fotografin. Ihre Fotografien erschienen in Magazinen, wie z. B. Cosmopolitan, Cover for Business Vogue, Joy, etc.

title: Doctor
description:
•Member of the American Dental Association, the American Association of Orthodontists and Diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics
•Nationally recognized lecturer
•Dr. Reynolds is recognized year after year by Hour Magazine as one of the top orthodontists in Metro Detroit. He lectures nationally and internationally on digitally customized orthodontics, the Damon System, advanced orthodontic technologies, soft-tissue lasers and aligners.

title: Dottor
description:
Laurea in Medicina e Chirurgia e Specializzazione in Odontostomatologia e Protesi dentaria presso l’Università degli Studi di Torino con due tesi di argomento ortodontico.

Nella stessa Università, presso La Clinica Odontostomatologica, a partire dal 1979 sino al 2000, segue il percorso da studente ad Aiuto Ospedaliero, dapprima nel reparto di Ortodonzia e Pedodonzia ed in seguito alla Ortododonzia della Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale. Ha ricoperti vari incarichi di insegnameto ed è autore di circa 40 pubblicazioni.

Formatosi seguendo i corsi dei Prof. Giorgio Maj, Sergio Bassani, Michel Langlade, Carl Gugino, Norman Cetlin, Giorgio Fiorelli e con la partecipazione al Master Damon dei dottori Ramon Perera ed Rafael Garcia Espejo.

Socio e frequentatore dei convegni di varie società ortodontiche quali SIDO, SIBOS, EOS,ESLO, AIOL.

Relatore in convegni a carattere locale e nazionale su argometo ortodontico.

Svolge attività privata in Provincia di Torino.

title: Dra.
description:
Se licencia en Odontología en la Universidad de Granada en el año 1991. Tras su licenciatura decide formarse en América donde realiza el Máster de Salud Pública y un Postgraduate Medical Education in GPR, (General Practice Residence) in the School of Dentistry, University of Puerto Rico, en 1993.
Es a partir del año 2002 cuando decide especializarse en el área de la Ortodoncia. Realiza el Postgrado en Ortodoncia Progresive Orthodontic Seminars entre los años 2000 y 2002.
Master Damon en 2008 y 2009, Certificada en Invisalign, Rehabilitación Neuroclusal y certificada en Kinesiología Médica Odontológica.
Es ponente habitual en eventos, y ha participado en Congresos a nivel nacional e internacional con el Sistema Damon.
Actualmente es Fundadora y Directora de AOS Damon e imparte el Programa Superior de formación en Damon. Es ponente oficial en las formaciones Damon

title: Dottor
description:
Laureato a pieni voti in Odontoiatria e Protesi dentaria nel Luglio 2012 presso l’Universitá degli Studi di Milano. Specializzato con lode e dignitá di stampa in Ortognatodonzia presso l’Universitá degli Studi di Torino. Iscritto al 1º anno del corso di Dottorato di Bioingegneria e Scienze Medico-Chirurgiche presso il Politecnico di Torino/Universitá degli Studi di Torino.

Clinical advisor presso TNB S.r.l.

Autore di numerosi articoi su riviste nazionali ed internazionali. Co-autore del capitolo 23 “Concetti di Gnatologia Neuromuscolare” del libro “Ortognatodonzia” – Autore Prof. Giampietro Farronato.

Svolge attivitá di relatore presso corsi e congressi nazionali ed internazionali.

title: Dottor
description:
2002 Laurea in Odontoiatria e Protesi Dentaria.
Dal 2001 si occupa di Ortodonzia iniziando a frequentare il Reparto di Odontoiatria dell’Ospedale San Raffaele di Milano dove diventa nel 2004 responsabile di riunito.
2003/2004 Direttore responsabile del servizio di Odontoiatria del Centro Militare di Medicina Legale (C.M.M.L.)di Bologna.
2008 Consulente scientifico presso il Reparto di Ortodonzia del Dipartimento di Odontoiatria “Ateneo Vita e Salute” Ospedale San Raffaele di Milano (Direttore Prof. Enrico Gherlone).
2010 Master in tecnica Damon presso l’Università degli Studi di Ferrara.
2012/2013 Master Europeo sul Damon System rilasciato dall’Institut d’Ortodoncia Perera.
Dal 2004 utilizza tecniche a bassa frizione in particolare la tecnica Damon.
Dal 2008 Docente/Moderatore del Damon System Study Club a Bergamo.
Dal 2013 Docente insieme al Dott.Davide Damiola nel corso “Realtà Clinica dei sistemi self-ligating passivi in ortodonzia”.
Svolge la libera professione come consulente di Ortodonzia a Milano e Bergamo.

title: Dr.
description:
– Studium der Zahnmedizin an der Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München
– wissenschaftlicher Mitarbeiter an der Universität München, zuständig für Lehre und Ausbildung von Zahnmedizin-Studenten
– Masterstudiengang Zahnmedizinische Prothetik an der Universität Greifswald
– Spezialisierung auf dem Gebiet der ästhetisch-rekonstruktiven Zahnmedizin, der Funktionsdiagnostik und Funktionstherapie, sowie minimalinvasiver und innovativer Behandlungskonzepte in der zahnärztlichen Prothetik und Implantologie
– Mitbegründer der dentalen Internetplattform www.rezottoproduction.com
– Autor zahlreicher nationaler und internationaler wissenschaftlicher Publikationen

title: Doctor
description: Salah is an orthodontist. He has graduated from the dental school in Copenhagen, post graduate program for Orthodontics. Salah is working as an orthodontist both in the public and in the private sector. Salah’s special interests are treatments with mini-screws, biomechanical principles and interdisciplinary treatments as multiple agenesis patients and orthognathic cases.

title: Dottor
description:
Il Dott. Giuseppe Salvato è nato a Milano il 22/4/1971

Specializzazione in Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale presso l’Università degli Studi di Milano direttore Prof. R. Brusati con votazione 70/70 e lode. Dal 2000 al Dicembre 2010 ha ricoperto l’incarico di Dirigente medico di I livello presso l’Unità Operativa di Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale dell’Ospedale San Gerardo di Monza.

Professore a contratto presso la Suola di Specializzazione in Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale dell’Università degli Studi Milano-Bicocca. Dal 2010 al 2014 ricopre un incarico libero-professionale presso L’U.O. di Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale dell’istituto Ortopedico Galeazzi Milano

Dal Novembre 2014 ricopre un incarico libero-professionale presso L’U.O. di Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale dell’istituto Stomatologico di Milano. Dal 2017-2018 Prof. A .c. chirurgia maxillo-facciale per scuola specialita chirurgia orale Universita VITA E SALUTE Osp San Raffaele Milano Dir. Prof. E. GHERLONE

E’ autore e coautore di diversi lavori scientifici su riviste nazionali ed internazionali; l’attività clinica e di ricerca si concentra principalmente nel campo della traumatologia maxillofacciale, ricostruzione delle ossa mascellari ed in particolare in chirurgia pre-protesica e implantologia, guide surgery; chirurgia ortognatodontica; chirurgia orale; chirurgia plastico-ricostruttiva ed estetica.

Ideatore della tecnica GSOS/GSCG in ortodonzia e chirurgia ortognatodontica per corticotomie e ostetomie dento alveolari. Libero professionista in Milano e Monza-brianza.

title: Dr.
description:
Dr Grzegorz Sanocki ukończył studia ortodontyczne na Uniwersytecie Warwick uzyskując tytuł Master of Science in Orthodontics (MSc in Orthodontics).

Ortodoncją zajmuje się od 2001 roku w tym Systemem Damona od 2005.

Obecnie prowadzi praktykę ortodontyczną w Londynie oraz Gorzowie Wielkopolskim jak również jest asystentem nauczania klinicznego na Uniwersytecie Warwick.

Prowadzi zajęcia Damon Study Club i jest zaangażowany w rozwój systemu Damona w Polsce.

Additionally, co-authored the chapter on orthodontic diagnosis and treatment-planning in “Orthodontic Practice and Principles”, the most widely-used graduate orthodontic textbook in the world.

title: Doctor
description:
Le Dr Giuseppe Scuzzo est diplômé de la Faculté de Médecine de Rome (1983), spécialiste en odontologie
(1987) et en orthodontie (Université de Ferrare).
Depuis 1983, il s’intéresse plus particulièrement à l’orthodontie linguale. Auteur de nombreuses publications
internationales sur cette technique (70), le Dr Scuzzo a également donné des conférences
en Italie et dans le monde entier.
Il travaille en collaboration avec les principales universités européennes et enseigne la technique
linguale à l’université de Ferrare, tout en étant Professeur associé à l’université Complutense de Madrid.
Il dirige également les Masters d’Orthodontie Linguale de ces 2 universités. Il a réalisé de nombreuses
communications à travers le monde et a publié avec le Dr Takemoto, 3 ouvrages sur la technique linguale. Le
cabinet du Dr Scuzzo à Rome est exclusivement consacré à la pratique de l’orthodontie linguale.
Certifié EBO (European Board Orthodontists), seule certification européenne sur tous les cas linguaux
Certifié WBLO (World Board of Lingual Orthodontists).

title: Dr.
description:
Dr. Giacomo Scuzzo, laureato in Odontoiatria nel 2012 presso l'Universitá Europea di Madrid,
specializzato in Ortodonzia nel 2016 presso l'Universitá di Ferrara.
Ha sempre lavorato esclusivamente in ortodonzia, con un interesse particolare per l'ortodonzia
linguale.
É professore a contratto di ortodonzia digitale presso l'Universitá di Ferrara e istruttore clinico
di tecnica di ortodonzia linguale presso l'Universitá Complutense di Madrid.
Il Dr. Scuzzo ha parlato e pubblicato in Italia e all'estero sull'ortodonzia linguale.
Membro del consiglio direttivo della Societá Italiana di Ortodonzia Linguale (AIOL).
Il Dr. Scuzzo ha uno studio privato limitato all'ortodonzia linguale a Roma, in Italia.

title: Dr.
description: Dr. Peter Seehofer hat 1987 die 1958 gegründete Praxis übernommen. Mit annähernd 300 Fortbildungen, Zusatzausbildungen und Curricula hat sich Dr. Seehofer eine umfangreiche Expertise in allen Bereichen der Zahnmedizin erworben. 2014 wurde die Praxis umfassend durch kompetente und hoch spezialisierte Fachärzte erweitert. So können auch sehr komplexe Fälle mit der Fachkompetenz aller vier Experten umfassend behandelt werden.

title: Doctor
description: Dr. Hans Seeholzer received his dental degree at the University of Munich, practical training in many well known Universities and offices in US. Owner of a big size office for 38 years near Munich. Finished more than 10 000 Patients. Since 27 years well known trainer and consultant for management, marketing and communication in Europe, Russia and Asia. Aerobatic pilot specialized in Russian planes, air photographer and publisher. Enjoy life!

title: Dipl.- Psich
description:
Jahrgang 1973, Studium der Betriebswirtschaftslehre und Psychologie in Regensburg.

Viele Jahre tätig als Psychotherapeut und Abteilungsleiter an der Ersten Deutschen Klinik für Traditionelle Chinesische Medizin in Bad Kötzting.

Jetzt Geschäftsführer der Professor Wühr und Simmel Gesundheits MANAGEMENT Systeme GbR und Mitinhaber der Praxisgemeinschaft Systemische Medizin PraSyMed in Regensburg, sowie Mitbegründer der Initiative Gesunde Unternehmen.

„Es sind die Menschen, deren Fähigkeiten und Wertvorstellungen, die das grundlegende Kapital eines jeden Unternehmens darstellen. Deshalb ist es notwendig und sinnvoll, diesen besondere Aufmerksamkeit zu schenken!“ Diesem Leitgedanken entsprechend und auf der Basis seiner Erfahrungen als Trainer und Coach in der Team- und Führungskräfteentwicklung für international ausgerichtete Konzerne, verwirklicht er mit seinen Partnern und Kunden maßgeschneiderte und ergebnisorientierte Seminare, Trainings und Beratungskonzepte.

Als Redner und Key-Note-Speaker begeistert er sein Publikum zu den Themen „Hauptsache GESUNDHEIT!“, „Charisma“ und „How not to get shot“ auf Vorträgen, Symposien und Kongressen im In- und Ausland.

Als Autor und Referent widmet er sich neben Themen des erfahrungs- und handlungsorientierten Lernens, werteorientierten Führungssystemen auch der Bewältigung von Burnout Phänomenen. Als Lehrbeauftragter unterrichtet er an der Hochschule Studenten in den Themen der Emotionalen Intelligenz, Prävention und Gesundheitsbildung.

seit 1999   freiberuflicher Berater und Trainer für Führungskräfte und Unternehmen

2000 Diplom-Psychologe, Abschluss des Studiums an der Universität Regensburg

2000 – 2007 Stellvertretender Leiter an der Erziehungs-, Jugend-  und Familienberatungsstelle Cham,
Qualitätsmanagementbeauftragter
2007 – 2012 bteilungsleiter an der Ersten Deutschen Klinik für Traditionelle Chinesische
 Medizin in Bad Kötzting, Aufbau einer Psychotherapeutischen Abteilung und
 Einführung des sino european prevention program
seit 2013 Gesellschafter und Geschäftsführer der Professor Wühr  und Simmel
 Gesundheits MANAGEMENT Systeme GbR
 sowie Mitbegründer der Praxisgemeinschaft Systemische Medizin
 PraSyMed in Regensburg
2014 Mitbegründer der Initiative Gesunde Unternehmen

title: Doctor
description:
Diplômé de l’université Emory en médecine
dentaire depuis 1975, le Dr John R.(Bob) Smith
a obtenu un Master en orthodontie
à l’université de Washington en 1977.
Un an plus tard, il remporte le prix Milo Hellman décerné
par l’American Association of Orthodontists.
Bob doit son succés aux recherches sur les appareils
linguaux effectuées dans le cadre de la « Lingual
Task Force » d’Ormco, dont il a été membre
fondateur.
Il a tenu des conférences dans le monde entier sur
de nombreux sujets orthodontiques. Il a également
publié plusieurs d’articles dans les domaines suivants
: orthodontie linguale, appareils Herbst de
mini-vis et protocoles de traitement permettant
l’amélioration de l’efficacité clinique grâce à des
torques variables.
Depuis 2005, il participe au développement des
appareils Insigna avec plus de 1500 cas traités par
brackets conventionnels ou autoligaturants passifs.
Il présentera dans quelle mesure ce système couplé
au scanner Lythos a amélioré l’efficacité de ses
traitements orthodontiques.

title: Dr.
description: Dr. Ashley Smith completed his Dental degree and graduated from the University of Queensland (UQ) in 1980.  He then completed his masters in Orthodontics (UQ) in 1986.  He has been in private orthodontic practice for over 30 years and is actively involved in improving and teaching the best practice for the Insignia appliance.  Dr. Smith has extensive experience in treatment and teaching the management of complex cases, with and without surgery.

title: Chirurgien maxillo-facial
description:
Membre de la société francaise de chirurgie maxillo-faciale et stomatologie
Membre du groupe GENIOS de recherche en ostéosynthèse de la face
Le docteur Luigi Taiariol est chirugien maxillo-facial depuis 1998.
 Ancien interne des hopitaux de nantes, ancien Chef de clinique des hopitaux de Nantes, il exerce en activité libérale depuis 2004 tout en gardant une activité partielle hospitalière en tant que praticien attaché des hopitaux au C.H. U. de Nantes.
 Il effectue également régulièrement des missions humanitaires dans le cadre de prise en charge des fentes labio-palatines.

title: Doctor
description:
Dr. Kyoto Takemoto graduated in 1979 from the Tokyo Dental College, with his specialty in
Orthodontics in 1981 from Tokyo Medical-Dental University. As an EBO and WBLO diplomate,
Dr. Takemoto is a world leader in lingual orthodontics, an active principle in multiple global lingual
orthodontic societies and was the former president and the founding director of the World Board of
Lingual Orthodontics and World Society of Lingual Orthodontics. He holds numerous global patents
in lingual orthodontics and has pioneered the advancement of the Lingual Straight Wire method. In
addition to his renowned research and teaching, Dr. Takemoto has a private practice in Japan, where
he practices lingual orthodontics exclusively.

title: Dottor
description: Laureato in Medicina e Chirurgia presso l’ Università degli studi di Milano nel 1978, specialista in Chirurgia Maxillo-Facciale presso la stessa Università nel 1985, Capo Reparto di Ortodonzia presso l’istituto Stomatologico Italiano di Milano dal 1985, Master in Tecnica Ortodontica Damon nel 2010, professore a contratto presso l’Università di Genova a.a. 2011-2012, Trainer di Programmazione Neuro Linguistica dal 1991, Councellor PNL dal 2003, Fellow Member Trainer della International Association for NLP (IANLP) dal 2004, Coach  PNL secondo i programmi della IANLP dal 2012, esperto in Ipnosi Ericksoniana, relatore a congressi, autore di publicazioni.

He then specialized in orthodontics completing his studies in Montreal in 1976. His continuing education has included programs in Osteopathy and Posturology. With over 40 years in orthodontic practice, he is a member of the Progressive Study Club and an active lecturer at conferences in Europe, Asia and around North America.

title: Dr.
description:
› Dr. Leon Verhagen completed his general dental training at The Radboud University of Nijmegen (The Netherlands) in 1980.
› He started a center of Integrated and Interdisciplinary Dental Care in Lichtenvoorde that same year.
› In 1986 he completed his specialty in Implantology and in 1996 he completed his specialty in Orofacial pain and Temporomandibular disorders at the University of Utrecht.
› He completed his gp-orthodontic training in 1992 and completed his master in laser dentistry at the University of Vienna in 2005.
› Dr. Leon Verhagen has been in private Interdisciplinary Dental Care practice in Lichtenvoorde, The Netherlands since 1980 and runs satellite clinics in Groenlo and Aalten.
› In 2004 he founded the course center Integrated Dentistry/ Integrated Orthodontics and trains GP’s (2 year program) and Orthodontists together with their staff in integrating Insignia and Digital Orthodontics in their offices.
› Dr. Leon Verhagen is a member of many (inter) national scientific societies and lectures (inter) nationally on topics including TMD and orofacial Pain, Implantology, Laser dentistry, Orthodontics and their integration.
› He has a great interest in the possibilities of 3D digital technology.

title: Docteurs et experts

title: Dr.
description:
Dr Agata Walkowiak-Śliziuk studia medyczne ukończyła na wydziale stomatologii Pomorskiej Akademii Medycznej w 1994 r.
Tytuł specjalisty II-go stopnia ortodoncji uzyskała w 2002 roku. Wcześniej zdała Państwowy Egzamin I-go stopnia ze stomatologii ogólnej.
Specjalizację z ortodoncji zdobywała pod kierunkiem dr n. med. I. Doniec-Zawidzkiej w Zakładzie Ortodoncji Pomorskiej Akademii Medycznej.
Uczestniczyła w licznych kursach znanych wykładowców , kongresach towarzystw ortodontycznych. 
Prowadzi wykłady i ćwiczenia dla logopedów w Akademii im. Jakuba z Paradyża w Gorzowie Wielkopolskim. Jest członkiem PTO i EOS. Od 15 lat prowadzi specjalistyczną praktykę lekarską w Gorzowie Wlkp. 
W ramach przyznanej akredytacji prowadzi szkolenie specjalizacyjne z ortodoncji lekarzy dentystów.
